item.title: The Structure of Deuteronomy (part 1)
item.description: Introduction This blog post presents the argument that Deuteronomy is an exposition of the Ten Commandments. I present the central argument followed by supporting evidence. Deuteronomy as an Exposition of the Ten Commandments For most of Christian history, there has been discussion and debate about how Christians ought to make sense of the books of the Law. The central section of Deuteronomy (chapters 12 - 26), for example, has raised questions like: “Is there any order to these rules?
